text:
@realDonaldTrump Trump's still trying to shift blame to @SpeakerPelosi for his FAILURE vs the #coronavirus.

FEB 24 - She modeled NOT being a bigot by NOT equating #COVIDー19 w/ Asian Americans

FEB 26 - Trump said we're heading to ZERO cases

We're at 1 MILLION now.

 https://t.co/6pRET9tyuK
